arStrings.szText:
When Raheir's {c_important}Valiance{/c} is triggered, your next {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} {c_important}Core{/c} Skills within {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds deal {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage and cost no Resource.

Raheir's {c_important}Valiance{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c}.
Next Core Skill consumes no Resource and deals [{SF_1}*100]% increased damage.
